sidebar.step_0.description: Phonononga izixhobo zethu ezibanzi kunye nezixhobo zokuphucula ukhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini kwindawo yakho yokusebenza.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: âš¡ Ngaba uyazi ukuba ukusebenzisa abanikezeli abanokuthenjwa nabanesimilo esihle kunokunciphisa iingozi emsebenzini ngokuqinisekisa ukuba umsebenzi wenziwa ngexesha kwaye ngokwemigangatho ephezulu yokhuseleko?
intro.title: Wamkelekile kwiZixhobo ze-OHS zeSalatiso
intro.description: Phonononga izixhobo zethu ezibanzi kunye nezixhobo zokuphucula ukhuseleko lwezempilo emsebenzini kwindawo yakho yokusebenza.
legal_obligations.client.title: Iimbopheleleko zoMthengi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(a): Lungiselela uVavanyo loMngcipheko oSisiseko (BRA) oluchonga iingozi zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(b): Nikezela ngeNkcazo yeMpilo noKhuseleko echaza iimfuno ezithile zeprojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(1)(l): Yamkela iSicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko seKontraka ngaphambi kokuba umsebenzi uqale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Iimbopheleleko zeKontraka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: UMmiselo woKwakha 7(1)(a): Ngenisa iSicwangciso seMpilo noKhuseleko esisekelwe kwinkcazo yomthengi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: UMmiselo woKwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina iFayile yeMpilo noKhuseleko kwisiza esinazo zonke izinto ezifunekayo.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: UMmiselo woKwakha 9: Qhuba uVavanyo loMngcipheko kunye noVavanyo lweZingozi zoMngcipheko (HIRAs) ezikhethekileyo kumsebenzi.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Iimbopheleleko zoMntu oQeqeshiweyo we-H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: UMmiselo woKwakha 5(5): AmaGosa (PrCHSA) alawula i-H&S egameni lomthengi, eqinisekisa ukuthobela umthetho.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: UMmiselo woKwakha 8(5): Amagosa (CHSO) ancedisa abakontraka ekuphumezeni nasekuhloleni iinkqubo ze-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Izikhokelo ze-SACPCMP: Kufuneka agcine ubhaliso kunye neemfuno ze-CPD zobungcali.
wizard.step_0: Nceda khetha inyathelo ukuze uqalise inkqubo.

wizard.step_1.error: Nceda khetha ubuncinane uxwebhu olunye oluza kuqulunqwa.
wizard.step_2.title: Inyathelo 2 kwe-9: Iinkcukacha zoMthengi
wizard.step_2.client_contact_person_erro: Nceda ngenisa umntu oqhagamshelana naye womthengi.
wizard.step_2.client_contact_role_error: Nceda ngenisa indima yomthengi oqhagamshelana naye.
wizard.step_3.title: Inyathelo 3 kwe-9: Ngaba uKontraka uQeshiwe?

wizard.step_4.contractor_contact_role_er: Nceda ngenisa indima yomntu oqhagamshelana naye wekontraka.

wizard.step_8.title: Inyathelo 8 kwe-9: Qulunqelwe
wizard.step_8.specify_error: Nceda chaza ukuba uxwebhu luqulunqelwe bani.

wizard.step_9.description: Phonononga ukhetho lwakho kwaye yongeza amaxwebhu kwingobozi yakho ukuze uqhubeke.
cart.title: Ingobozi Yakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo yeReferensi ye-Invoice: (Isebenza iintsuku ezisi-7. Bhalisa ukuze ugcine unaphakade!)
resources.title: Qhagamshelana naBachwepheshe be-H&S abaVunyiweyo
resources.description: Ngaba ufuna uncedo lobuchwepheshe? Qhagamshelana nabachwepheshe abavunyiweyo ngeemfuno zeprojekthi yakho.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, Ummeli we-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Inombolo yoBhaliso: PR12345 - Uqhagamshelwano: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, Igosa le-SACPCMP (CHSO) - Inombolo yoBhaliso: CHSO67890 - Uqhagamshelwano: john.smith@example.com
footer.copyright: Â© 2025 Izixhobo ze-OHS zeSalatiso. Onke Amalungelo Agciniwe.
footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Uhlaziyiwe
chatbot.response: Ndilapha ukunceda! Ngolwazi lwe-OHS olwenzelwe wena, nceda uqhagamshelane nochwepheshe.
training.title: uQeqesho oluBanzi lweNdawo yoMsebenzi
training.description: Phonononga iinkqubo zethu zoqeqesho ezibanzi zendawo yomsebenzi ukuqinisekisa ukuthobela imithetho ye-OHS yaseMzantsi Afrika kwaye ukhuthaze indawo yokusebenza ekhuselekileyo. Khetha uqeqesho olusebenzayo, uqeqesho lweqela, okanye sebenzisa iwizadi yethu ukufumana iingcebiso ezilungiselelwe wena ngokusekelwe kwishishini lakho, abaphulaphuli ojolise kubo, kunye nendawo yakho.
training.wizard.start: Nceda khetha ukhetho ukuze uqalise inkqubo yengcebiso yoqeqesho.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Inyathelo 1 kwe-5: Khetha iShishini Lakho
training.wizard.step_1.label: iShishini:
training.wizard.step_2.title: Inyathelo 2 kwe-5: Khetha abaphulaphuli ojolise kubo
training.wizard.step_2.label: Abaphulaphuli ojolise kubo (Khetha konke okusebenzayo):
training.wizard.step_2.error: Nceda khetha ubuncinane abaphulaphuli abajoliswe kubo abanye.
training.wizard.step_2.option_emergency_: Iqela leNgxamiseko (Abaqeqeshi bokuNceda kuQala, AbaCimi boMlilo)
training.wizard.step_3.title: Inyathelo 3 kwe-5: Chaza Indawo Yakho
training.wizard.step_4.title: Inyathelo 4 kwe-5: Iikhrayitheriya ezoNgezelelweyo
training.wizard.step_5.title: Inyathelo 5 kwe-5: Phonononga uQeqesho oluCetyiswayo
training.wizard.step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe kwizinto ongenise, nazi iinkqubo zoqeqesho ezicetyiswayo. Khetha ezo ufuna ukuzongeza kwingobozi yakho.
training.cart.title: Ingobozi Yakho yoQeqesho
training.cart.customization.title: Lungiselela Izixhobo Zakho zoQeqesho
training.cart.customization.first_aider_: Nceda ngenisa igama lomntu onceda kuqala.
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Nceda ngenisa inombolo yoqhagamshelwano kangxamiseko esebenzayo (umzekelo, +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Qulunqwe Ngu
training.cart.training_type.title: Indlela yokuNika uQeqesho
training.cart.training_type.label: Khetha Indlela yokuNika:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Isaziso seSafetyHelp: Izixhobo zoqeqesho ezinikezelweyo zenzelwe iinjongo zolwazi kuphela kwaye aziboneleli ngengcebiso yobungcali. Ngeengcebiso ze-OHS ezilungiselelwe wena, qhagamshelana neSafetyHelp ku support@safetyhelp.co.za okanye undwendwele Iphepha loQhagamshelwano.
training.checkout.success: Intlawulo iphumelele! Izixhobo zakho zoqeqesho zenziwe. Khuphela ii-PDF zakho ngezantsi. Ngokuqeqesha kwi-intanethi, iikhowudi zokungena zithunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyile.
training.providers.title: Abanikezeli boQeqesho abaVunyiweyo
training.providers.description: Ngaba ufuna uqeqesho olwenziwa ngumntu? Qhagamshelana nabanikezeli boqeqesho abavunyiweyo ngeemfuno zakho.
training.providers.provider_1: I-ABC Training Solutions - I-SETA Evunyiweyo - Igxile kuNcedo lokuQala, ukuCima uMlilo - Uqhagamshelwano: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: I-SafeSkills Academy - Ibhaliswe kwi-SACPCMP - Igxile kuKhuseleko loKwakha - Uqhagamshelwano: training@safeskills.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Thenga iManyuwali yoQeqesho eLungiswayo
training.manual.purchase.description: Fumana imanyuwali yoqeqesho ebanzi elungiselelwe inkampani yakho, ebandakanya iimfuno zomthetho, umxholo okhethekileyo wenkampani ngokusekelwe kwiprofayile yakho yomngcipheko, kunye neengxelo zabanikezeli boqeqesho abavunyiweyo.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Chaza iProfayile yoMngcipheko weManyuwali yakho yoQeqesho
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Iprofayile yoMngcipheko:
training.selection_method.title: Khetha Indlela yakho yoQeqesho
training.legal_fact.step_1: Inyaniso yoMthetho: UMthetho we-OHS uMmiselo 8 ufuna ukuba abaqeshi banikeze uqeqesho olulungiselelwe iingozi ezithile zendawo yokusebenza.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Inyaniso eMnandi: Ngaba uyazi ukuba uqeqesho rhoqo lunokunciphisa iingozi emsebenzini ngokukhuthaza indawo yokusebenza ekhuselekileyo?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Inyaniso yoMthetho: Oomasipala bendawo banokuba nemimiselo ye-OHS eyahlukileyo echaphazela iimfuno zoqeqesho.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Inyaniso eMnandi: Ngaba uyazi ukuba iindawo zokusebenza ezinobungozi obuphezulu njengeziza zokwakha zifuna uqeqesho rhoqo ukuze kugcinwe imigangatho yokhuseleko?
training.legal_fact.step_5: Inyaniso yoMthetho: UMthetho we-OHS uyayalela uqeqesho oluthile lweendima ezifana nabameli be-SHE ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthotyelwa.
legislation.title: uMmandla woMthetho we-OHS kunye noLawulo loMngcipheko
legislation.description: Yenza ummandla womthetho we-OHS kunye nesicwangciso solawulo lomngcipheko esilungiselelwe ishishini lakho. Ngenisa iinkcukacha zenkampani yakho, imisebenzi, kunye neengozi ukuze ufumane ingxelo yokuthotyelwa ebanzi equka umthetho waseMzantsi Afrika, imithetho kamasipala, kunye nemigangatho yamazwe ngamazwe.
legislation.wizard.title: Yenza i-RMP Yakho
legislation.wizard.step_1.title: Inyathelo 1 kwe-4: Iinkcukacha zeNkampani
legislation.wizard.step_2.title: Inyathelo 2 kwe-4: Imisebenzi
legislation.wizard.step_2.label: Khetha Imisebenzi (Khetha yonke esebenzayo):
legislation.wizard.step_3.title: Inyathelo 3 kwe-4: Iingozi
legislation.wizard.step_3.label: Khetha Iingozi (Khetha yonke esebenzayo):
legislation.wizard.step_4.title: Inyathelo 4 kwe-4: Phonononga kwaye Yenza
legislation.wizard.step_4.description: Phonononga izinto ongenisileyo kwaye yenza i-RMP yakho. Ungayongeza umthetho ongezelelweyo ukuba uyafuna.
legislation.wizard.step_4.additional_leg: Ngenisa nawuphi na umthetho ongezelelweyo apha...
legislation.cart.title: Ukuphuma
legislation.cart.description: I-RMP yakho yenziwe! Sebenzisa ikhowudi yevawutsha FREERMP2025 ukuze ukhuphele simahla (kubasebenzisi bokuqala abali-100).
suppliers.title: Uluhlu lwabaNikezeli be-OHS
suppliers.description: Fumana kwaye ubeke abanikezeli be-OHS eMzantsi Afrika. Jonga ngokwendawo, iinkonzo, kunye nezatifikethi. Ngenisa izivavanyo zakho ukunceda abanye bakhethe abanikezeli abalungileyo.
suppliers.list.title: Uluhlu lwabaNikezeli
suppliers.table.name: Igama loMboneleli
suppliers.review_form.title: Ngenisa uVavanyo
community_tools.title: Izixhobo zoKhuseleko loLuntu
community_tools.description: Xela nasiphi na isiganeko sokhuseleko okanye ingozi kwindawo yoluntu okanye yokusebenza kwakho, ukusuka kwimigodi emgqibeleni ukuya kwisixhobo esineziphene. Sebenzisa izixhobo zethu ukuqinisekisa ukhuseleko kwiindawo ezifana neevenkile zespaza, izikolo, izibhedlele, kunye neethaveni.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Xela iSiganeko okanye iNgozi
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Chaza isiganeko okanye ingozi (umzekelo, umgodi kuMain Street, isihlalo esophukileyo kwiziko loluntu)...
community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: Isibambo sakho seMidiya yoLuntu (Ngokuzikhethela, umzekelo, @username ku-X):
community_tools.incident_report.provider: Ngenisa umnxeba okanye i-imeyile (izaliswa ngokuzenzekelayo ukuba umnikezeli ukhethiwe)...
Isibambo seMidiya yoLuntu soMnikezeli weNkonzo (Ngokuzikhethela, umzekelo, @CityofJoburgZA ku-X):
Ngenisa isibambo se-X (sizaliswa ngokuzenzekelayo ukuba umnikezeli ukhethiwe)...
community_tools.list.title: Ezinye Izixhobo zoKhuseleko loLuntu
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Uluhlu lwe-OHS lweSitolo seSpaza
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Qinisekisa ukuba isitolo sakho sespaza siyahlangabezana neemfuno zokhuseleko lomlilo, zombane, kunye nesakhiwo ngokweemithetho kamasipala kunye noMthetho we-OHS.
community_tools.list.school.title: Isikhokelo soKhuseleko loMlilo seSikolo
community_tools.list.school.description: Funda iimfuno zomthetho zokhuseleko lomlilo ezikolweni, ezibandakanya izicwangciso zokuphuma kunye nezixhobo.
community_tools.list.hospital.title: Isikhokelo sokuLungiselela iNgxamiseko seSibhedlele
community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Qinisekisa ukuba izibhedlele zilungiselelwe iimeko zongxamiseko ngezicwangciso zokuphuma ezifanelekileyo kunye nezixhobo zokhuseleko.
community_tools.list.tavern.title: Uluhlu lwe-OHS lweThaveni
community_tools.list.tavern.description: Jonga ukuba iithaveni ziyahlangabezana nemithetho yokhuseleko lomlilo kunye nolawulo lwezihlwele ukuthintela iziganeko.
dashboard.title: Ideshibhodi yeLungu
dashboard.welcome: Wamkelekile, [Igama loMsebenzisi]! Lawula ukuthotyelwa kwakho kwe-OHS, ii-RMP, izivavanyo zabanikezeli, kunye neengxelo zoluntu apha.
